attributes.action: sack those found guilty of bringing Parliament into disrepute with their "expenses" claims and to bar them from holding public office for fifteen years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I also challenge the Prime Minister to do the right thing for once, and to strip any lord of his/her title if they are found guilty of inappropriate expenses claims or found guilty of taking "bungs" (cash for questions). Any expenses,which are really benefits in kind,should be repaid, with interest and the relevant tax on benefits in kind must be levied.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
